action.insight: 40 upcoming sites across 19 markets are "Not Ready" with swap dates within the next 7 days. All 40 sites have critical risks, averaging 4.33 at-risk items per site.
action.description: 40 Critical Upcoming Sites Not Ready in 7 Days.

action.insight: Mobile and Birmingham markets each have 2 sites with 100% SLA breaches. Key delays include BOM Received (avg. 19 days in Mobile, 16 days in Birmingham) and Material Pickup (avg. 10.5 and 8.5 days, respectively).
action.description: South Region SLA Breaches Concentrated in Mobile and Birmingham.

info.insight: Pittsburgh (Central) achieved the lowest average cycle time (47.79 days), zero delays, and 100% on-time rate across 14 sites, setting a benchmark for best practices.
info.description: Pittsburgh Leads in Best Practice Performance.

info.insight: Procurement accounts for 69.6% of total cycle time across 39 markets, with average procurement days ranging from 32.75 to 34.0, highlighting its critical role in project timelines.
info.description: Procurement Phase Dominates Total Cycle Time.

info.insight: Central region completed 1,442 sites with a 100% on-time rate in 23 markets, outperforming South (99.4%) and West (99.3%) regions.
info.description: Central Region Achieves Highest On-Time Completion Rate.
